articles.title: Stocks slide, treasury yields jump as inflation fears crescendo - Reuters
articles.description: Asian and European shares fell, U.S. and European bond yields hit multi-year highs, and oil prices climbed on Wednesday as investors braced for tighter monetary policy to combat troubling levels of inflation.
